alert.note: Alert for Conway; Pope; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 10:59PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Van Buren, northeastern Conway and southeastern Pope Counties through 1130 PM CST... At 1058 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Happy Bend, or 7 miles northwest of Morrilton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atkins... Bethlehem... Lanty... Hill Creek... Happy Bend... Solgohachia... St. Vincent... Catholic Point... Blick... Hattieville... Springfield... Middleton... Birdtown... Austin in Conway County... Blackwell... Overcup... Wonderview... Culpepper... Formosa... Economy... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 94 and 103. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for central and north central Arkansas.
